Detailed Description

A force generator with an aerodynamic surface that can be re-oriented relative to its rigid body. This derives the

Member Function Documentation

◆ setOrientation()

void cyclone::AngledAero::setOrientation ( const Quaternion &  quat)

Sets the relative orientation of the aerodynamic surface, relative to the rigid body it is attached to. Note that this doesn't affect the point of connection of the surface to the body.
